-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Aeropuerto"
(
    "idAvion" bigint NOT NULL,
    "Modelo" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Peso" bigint,
    "Capacidad" bigint,
    CONSTRAINT "Aeropuerto_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("idAvion")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Hangar"
(
    "idHangar" bigint NOT NULL,
    "Capacidad" bigint,
    "Localizacion" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "idAvion" bigint,
    CONSTRAINT "Hangar_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("idHangar")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Pilotos"
(
    "idLicencia" bigint NOT NULL,
    "Restricciones" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Salario" bigint,
    "Turno" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "idAvion" bigint,
    CONSTRAINT "Pilotos_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("idLicencia")
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Hangar"
    ADD CONSTRAINT "idAvion_fgkey" FOREIGN KEY ("idAvion")
    REFERENCES public."Aeropuerto" ("idAvion") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Pilotos"
    ADD CONSTRAINT "idAvion_fgkey" FOREIGN KEY ("idAvion")
    REFERENCES public."Aeropuerto" ("idAvion") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
